smallMod:AdjustableArmor.NAME: Adjustable Armor.
smallMod:AdjustableArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL  Can only be upgraded in combat.

smallMod:AdjustableClub.NAME: Adjustable Club.
smallMod:AdjustableClub.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be upgraded in combat.

smallMod:BarrelStorage.NAME: Barrel Storage
smallMod:BarrelStorage.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Crack the Barrel into your deck.

smallMod:CrackTheBarrel.NAME: Crack the barrel
smallMod:CrackTheBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Can be upgraded any number of times.

smallMod:DropExtraWeight.NAME: Drop Extra Weight
smallMod:DropExtraWeight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! energy. Draw !smallMod:SecondMagic! fewer cards each turn.

smallMod:Genius.NAME: Genius
smallMod:Genius.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play costs 0 and exhausts

smallMod:HotPotato.NAME: Hot Potato
smallMod:HotPotato.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, take !M! damage.

smallMod:HunkerDown.NAME: Hunker down
smallMod:HunkerDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Apply !M! Weakened to yourself

smallMod:MasterSmith.NAME: Master Smith
smallMod:MasterSmith.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade every second card you play for the rest of this combat.
smallMod:MasterSmith.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade every card you play for the rest of this combat.

smallMod:PortableForge.NAME: Portable forge
smallMod:PortableForge.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards in your hand. NL Retain NL Exhaust NL Add a copy of Portable forge to your hand.
smallMod:PortableForge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Upgrade ALL cards in your hand. NL Retain NL Exhaust NL Add a copy of Portable forge to your hand.

smallMod:RepurposeShield.NAME: Repurpose Shield
smallMod:RepurposeShield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself

smallMod:SmithsDrift.NAME: Smith's Drift
smallMod:SmithsDrift.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you have an upgraded card in your hand, draw a card.
smallMod:SmithsDrift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Draw a card for every upgraded card in your hand.

smallMod:SmithsHammer.NAME: Smith's Hammer
smallMod:SmithsHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Upgrade a card in your hand.

smallMod:SpikedArmor.NAME: Spiked Armor
smallMod:SpikedArmor.DESCRIPTION: Every time you gain block, Gain !M! Temporary Thorns.

smallMod:SpikeStrike.NAME: Spike Strike
smallMod:SpikeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Deals 2 more damage for every Thorns you have.

smallMod:SpringTrap.NAME: Spring Trap
smallMod:SpringTrap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Deal !M! damage to the next enemy that attacks you.

smallMod:StrikeWhileTheIronIsHot.NAME: Strike While The Iron Is Hot
smallMod:StrikeWhileTheIronIsHot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for every upgraded card in your deck. NL !D! damage

smallMod:SurroundedByGold.NAME: Surrounded By Gold
smallMod:SurroundedByGold.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 block for every 10 gold you have. !B! block.

smallMod:TheBarrel.NAME: The Barrel
smallMod:TheBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Shuffle a Crack the barrel into your deck.

smallMod:TwoHandedAxe.NAME: Two Handed Axe
smallMod:TwoHandedAxe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. If you are Vulnerable, deal !D! additional Damage.

smallMod:TwoHandedShield.NAME: Two Handed Shield
smallMod:TwoHandedShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. If you are Weak, gain !B! additional block.

smallMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
smallMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !smallMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

smallMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
smallMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !smallMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy. NL [#0000ff]This[] [#ff0000]Is[] [#ffff00]How[] [#88888]color[] [#ff00ff]works.[]"
